ISSUE.TITLE: now alias rm shows undefined when using custom rules
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: `now alias ls` works fine: ``` $ now alias ls > 9 aliases found [25s] id source url created e53FKD3s5fsLCa0D4emq0dLF [2 custom rules] https://my.domain 11m ago ... ``` But `now alias rm` has a display issue: ``` $ now alias rm https://my.domain - > The following alias will be removed permanently e53FKD3s5fsLCa0D4emq0dLF https://undefined https://my.domain ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-node] Bump ncc to 0.18.1 (#411) * [now-node] Bump ncc to 0.18.1 * Fix unit test

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Develop Next.js app inside workPath (#410) * Develop Next.js app inside workPath * Made file watching work * Define routes the first time * Added index handling * Fixed indexing * Fixed indexing again * Removed useless code * Start server in child process
